events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund for it.
The customer's message was reviewed and the case has been categorized under Refund as they requested money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding their recent order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with the refund process for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so that I can proceed with your request?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description on the website, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the information. We can start the refund process immediately and arrange for the product to be returned at no cost to you.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the prompt response and the offer to cover the return shipping.
The refund has been approved and the shipping label for the return has been sent to your email. Please use it to send the product back.
We are following up to ensure you have successfully returned the product and to confirm the refund has been processed on our end.
Your refund case has been closed since the return was received and the refund was completed. Thank you for your patience.
